author: Lingling Wei
title: China Targets Risk With Bureaucracy Overhaul
text:
BEIJING—China’s overhaul of its financial and business regulators will give the country’s leadership more punch in its top-priority battle to fend off deep-seated risks in the banking system and overall economy.
Under a plan reviewed by China’s legislature on Tuesday, the separate agencies that oversee the country’s banks and insurance companies will be combined into a new commission to “ensure the nation’s financial safety.”
